title: Foods that help control blood pressure - 10 common foods to control blood pressure | The Times of India
text:
10 common foods to control blood pressure Feburary 23, 2017 1 /11 Foods that help control blood pressure 
A sedentary lifestyle has coined a new term for us â€“ Lifestyle diseases. These diseases are those that can easily be managed by a slight tweak in the way we lead our lives. Certain dietary additions and deductions can help you manage a case of hypertension. You may be going low on salt and doing power walks but there are many unknown and effective ways you can fight hypertension. Take a look at the following simple foods that can keep a shooting blood pressure at bay. All Comments ()
